body: Hi,  Love the plugin, but I am getting an error here. (Probably a user error). Anyway, my building is not rotating at all. The yellow surface component is after I attached it so it does not apply here. I attached the definition with the data internalized.  Thank you in advance![](http://api.ning.com:80/files/BN*THHPnC7DvuEO9neETVffp9XBtMmEJ3x8bxqgC6m6O3WZkYjsSd0CTEJGfWQ06jKO2yws9KC5sUFbgMV9hctIVPGVp5*Wb/error3.PNG)
